cards.name: Well, That Was Disappointing
cards.description: Your party's senses stand to alert - but it was just a frog. Nothing happens.

cards.name: Useless, But Safe
cards.description: A hurricane blasts through your group and misses every fighter. Nothing happens.

cards.name: A Sigh of Relief
cards.description: Absolutely nothing of any danger lurks anywhere. Nothing happens.

cards.name: Your Band Survives
cards.description: Time goes on. Nothing happens.

cards.name: A Mild Drizzle
cards.description: A few drops fall on the heads of your fighters. Nothing happens.

cards.name: A Pleasant Breeze
cards.description: A gentle breeze calms your nerves. Nothing happens.

cards.name: Distant Wolves Howling
cards.description: You hear them, but you can’t see them. Nothing happens.

cards.name: Bells Ring Elsewhere
cards.description: Someone else lives or dies. Nothing happens.

cards.name: A Favourable Wind
cards.description: All of the Card Drawers’ fighters gain a free 1 square movement in one global direction of the Card Drawers’ choice. If blocked by teammates or the battlefield’s edge, they do not move.

cards.name: A Strong Gust
cards.description: Choose one straight line across the board (edge to edge). Each fighter on that line is shifted by 1 square in a single direction of the Card Drawer’s choosing. If blocked by teammates or the battlefield’s edge, they do not move.

cards.name: Lightning Strikes
cards.description: Choose one straight line across the board (edge to edge). Each fighter on that line takes a fixed HIT: 6 attack and must roll a defence against it, DAMAGE: 1 if successful.

cards.name: Tables Turn
cards.description: The Players switch order following this Fate Deck Phase. The current Player 2(Follower) will now be the first to attack and move in the following turns, unless this card is drawn again.

cards.name: Thick Fog
cards.description: All attacks suffer –1 HIT until the next Fate Deck draw.

cards.name: Sudden Silence
cards.description: No Fate Cards are drawn next round.

cards.name: A Dividing Earthquake
cards.description: All fighters are pushed 1 square toward their starting edge. If blocked by teammates or the battlefield’s edge, they do not move.

cards.name: Asteroid Strike
cards.description: All characters on the board take a fixed HIT: 6 attack and must roll a defence against it, DAMAGE: 1 if successful.

cards.name: The Grave Call
cards.description: One dead fighter may be returned to the battlefield with 1 HEALTH stat. If no dead fighters are available, the player must choose a fighter on their team to take a fixed HIT: 5 attack and must roll a defence against it, DAMAGE: 1 if successful.

cards.name: A Healthy Boost
cards.description: One of your fighters receives +1 HEALTH.

cards.name: Battle Cry
cards.description: All of your fighters gain +1 HIT until the end of this round.

cards.name: Momentary Weakness
cards.description: All of your fighters gain -1 DEF until the end of this round.

cards.name: Double Tap
cards.description: One of your fighters may attack twice in this turn.

cards.name: Shield Wall
cards.description: One fighter of your choice gains +2 DEF until their next defence roll.

cards.name: Desperation
cards.description: One fighter on 1 HEALTH gains +2 HIT until the end of this round.

cards.name: Not Yet, You
cards.description: A single fighter at 1 HEALTH returns to full Base HEALTH stat OR receives +2 HEALTH.

cards.name: Fresh Air Heals All
cards.description: All fighters on the field (Both Player Teams) receive +1 HEALTH.

cards.name: Pre-Emptive Strike
cards.description: This player attacks first for this round. If the Drawer of this card is already first, one fighter is allowed two attacks this turn with separate HIT and DEF rolls, but only on one target. This effect overrides any other turn-altering effects.
